sentences.sContent: To overdo anything public may lead to jobbery, while appropriate selfishness may promote the growth.
sentences.sContent_eng: To overdo anything public may lead to jobbery, while appropriate selfishness may promote the growth.
sentences.sCn: “公”字过头可能假公济私，私心适度也会促进发展。

sentences.sContent: Organization of a few rural economics is on fund management, the tendency common occurance of jobbery .
sentences.sContent_eng: Organization of a few rural economics is on fund management, the tendency common occurance of jobbery .
sentences.sCn: 一些农村经济组织在资金治理上，假公济私的倾向屡见不鲜。

trans.tranOther: the practice of making private profit out of a public office; corruption or graft
